unnormalised: **Entertainment News: Is Your Chai Stronger Than Your Streaming Bill?**
normalised: Entertainment News: Is Your Chai Stronger Than Your Streaming Bill?

unnormalised: Mumbai: Music streaming services are engaged in a fierce 'raag' battle! Apparently, even *gharanas* in Banaras are debating whether Spotify or Gaana delivers a better *thumri* experience.
normalised: Mumbai: Music streaming services are engaged in a fierce 'raag' battle! Apparently, even gharanas in Banaras are debating whether Spotify or Gaana delivers a better thumri experience.

unnormalised: Reports suggest subscriptions are up, mostly fuelled by Gen Z who'd rather pay Rs. 99 than risk hearing *'Tum Paas Aaye'* on loop at their local tea stall.
normalised: Reports suggest subscriptions are up, mostly fuelled by Generation Z who'd rather pay rupee ninety nine than risk hearing 'Tum Paas Aaye' on loop at their local tea stall.

unnormalised: IIT Delhi researchers recently published a paper titled "Algorithmically Curated Desi Beats: A Blessing or a Curse?". (We're leaning towards blessing. That auto-tuned *bhangra* at Uncle Sharma's wedding almost caused a stampede).
normalised: I I T Delhi researchers recently published a paper titled "Algorithmically Curated Desi Beats: A Blessing or a Curse?". (We're leaning towards blessing. That auto-tuned bhangra at Uncle Sharma's wedding almost caused a stampede).

unnormalised: Meanwhile, industry experts predict a Bollywood-style climax where all streaming services unite against the real enemy: Grandma's insistent demand for devotional music at ear-splitting volume.
normalised: Meanwhile, industry experts predict a Bollywood-style climax where all streaming services unite against the real enemy: Grandma's insistent demand for devotional music at ear-splitting volume.

unnormalised: Will *'Shanti Shanti Shanti'* prevail? Or will *'Dhoom Machale'* conquer all? Stay tuned! And maybe invest in some noise-cancelling headphones. Your ears will thank you.
normalised: Will 'Shanti Shanti Shanti' prevail? Or will 'Dhoom Machale' conquer all? Stay tuned! And maybe invest in some noise-cancelling headphones. Your ears will thank you.
